UNKNOWN_ERROR.developerMessage: The error is unknown. We already know about it and try to find why it happened.

ACCESS_DENIED.developerMessage: Acess to this resource is denied. You can contact administrator in case of mistake.

NO_TOKEN.developerMessage: No token provided. Please POST login and password to /login to get token

BAD_TOKEN.developerMessage: Provided token not accesable. Please, POST login and password to /login to get actual token

OLD_TOKEN.developerMessage: Provided token is to old. Please, POST login and password to /login to get actual token

USER_NOT_FOUND.developerMessage: Provided information not enough to find user

NO_USERS.developerMessage: No users in the database at all

ASSET_NOT_FOUND.developerMessage: No asset with this parameters owned by this user was found

NO_ASSETS.developerMessage: No assets owned by this user in the database. Please, use POST to add new one

NOT_A_FOLDER.developerMessage: Asset is not a folder type, so it cannot store additional files

ASSET_EXISTS.developerMessage: Asset with provided name already exists in provided folder

NO_OPTIONS.developerMessage: No options in the database at all

LIMIT_TOTAL_SIZE.developerMessage: There is no space to store user's file. You can delete some files to free some space or upgrade your account to incrase your storage limits

LIMIT_COUNT_FILES.developerMessage: Count of all files is equal to count files limit. You can delete one file to store this file or upgrade your account to incrase your storage limits
